scene.name: Junon3
scene.p: Cloud and the others arrive at lower Junon.

Woman
They say Shinra's gathering Huge Materia from around the world and bringing it to Junon.
Bringing it to Junon must mean they want to use their airplanes.
I've noticed there's been a lot of Shinra ships recently. I think they're going to the off-shore Underwater Reactor.
Isn't Shinra trying to transport the Reactor's Huge Materia?

Older Man
I remember years ago, seein' the Shinra build a long pipe underwater.
The underwater reactor is connected to Junon by a pipe.
You should be able to get to the reactor through it.

Priscilla
Who are you---?
Cloud!!
Stupid jerk! Look how much you made me worry!! Were you at the Lifestream?

Cloud
Yeah, that's right.

Priscilla
You've gotta be more careful! Because you're going to marry me one day.

Soldier by Elevator
If you want to get on the elevator that badly, give me 10 gil!

Cloud
- Okay, I guess

Soldier by Elevator
Hurry up and get in!
Cloud takes the elevator to Upper Junon.

Soldier on the Path to the Airport
The Shinra's collecting Huge Materia at the Junon Undersea Reactor!
When they're done, they'll bring it to this airport.
Get out of here before you get in the way!
What... me? I'm gonna be watching from here, so that I don't get in their way either!
Cloud runs outside to the airport.

Soldier
After they get it, they'll take it to the airport and will transport it to Rocket Town by Gelnika. Don't let your guard down!

Soldier 2
They've finally started collecting the Huge Materia from the Junon Underwater Reactor.
Cloud leaves the base and starts down the street, then stops and turns to his companions.

Cloud
I may be mistaken, but...... Doesn't it feel like we're missing something?
Cloud and the others continue on. On the way to the reactor, they come across a commander drilling his soldiers.

Commander
All right!! Let's see how hard you trained!
Attention! Charge--!!
The soldiers all charge in the opposite direction.

Commander
He... hey--!! That's the Underwater Reactor!! Come back!!
Cloud gets on the first elevator with two soldiers and a redhead.

Soldier
How 'bout, whoever stays alive, gets to take her out?

Soldier 2
All right, you're on!!
But... What if both of us...

Soldier
Whoa!! Don't even talk about that!
Cloud defeats both of them.

Redhead
...gulp... (Great... there went two perfectly good men!)
The elevator reaches the lower floor.

Soldier 3
OK! Back to work!! Back to work!!

Soldier 4
Yawn... I'm sleepy!!

Soldier 3
For Junon!!
Cloud and the others continue on down another elevator and through the underwater pipe to the reactor.

Soldiers in Reactor
You, you're Cloud!!
You are NOT getting this Huge Materia!!
So you WERE after the Huge Materia!
Cloud and the others reach where the Huge Materia is stored.

Cloud
!? The Huge Materia!
They watch as a machine arm reaches down and pulls out the materia.

Yuffie
Hey! A Crane Game!

Barret
Damn, just missed it!

Vincent
We were a little late...

Cid
That's what you think! ^%$@#&$#!

Tifa
They're gonna take it on that submarine!

Nanaki
If we take a short cut, we might just make it......!

Cait Sith
There's the submarine dock just ahead of us.
They run to the submarine docks. Reno is standing with his back to them, supervising.

Cloud
Did we make it!?
He watches as the Huge Materia is lowered into the red submarine.

Reno
What are you doing? Help load.
He turns around.
Cloud!?

Nanaki
Help?

Barret
We're gonna help transport the Huge Materia... Reno!

Yuffie
I'm SURE! You want me to do manual labor?

Cid
You know I don't work for cheap!

Vincent
I refuse...

Tifa
Looks like we barely made it.

Cloud
Either give it to us or else.
...which is it gonna be?

Reno
Unfortunately, I don't have time to deal with you.
My priority is the Huge Materia!
He runs off, leaving Cloud and the others to fight a robot. After the battle, they find the red sub has already left.

Cloud
Damn! The submarine!

Yuffie
!? The Huge Materia!

Barret
Damn! So they was just buyin' time!?

Tifa
We have to go after it!

Nanaki
But it's already in the water!

Cait Sith
It left the dock!

Vincent
There is one way...

Cid
Hold on to your horses! Let's get it from them!!
They run for the other submarine, and the soldiers on board turn frantic.

Soldiers
Y, you...!
You're not taking over this ship!
They defeat the soldiers and get on board.

Soldiers
You want the Sub? Just try an' take it!
Um... sir! Maybe we shouldn't piss them off...
They fight off these soldiers, too.

Barret
Come on, Cloud! Follow me!
Damn, man!! ......what the...?
Hey yo! Remember I was the leader first, man!
Yo! We come a long ways since we got on that train!
Lotsa things changed! This and that.
They enter the bridge.

Commander
NO, NO!! This is terrible!

Soldiers
We don't have much time left! I don't want to die!
There's still so much more I've got to do!
I never even got to do my special victory dance in battle!

Commander
All right!! Then make this your first victory!!
Go on, show 'em!!

Soldiers
Yes, sir!!

Commander
Remember your last training. Begin!!

Soldiers
Yes, sir!!

Commander
I'm back! An' now I got no regrets!!
ATT----ACK!!

Cloud
Hmmmm...
- Fight them
- Take them prisoner

Captain
Let me show you how it's done.

Soldier
Eyaaarrrgh!
Captain... I can't hold on any longer!
Eyaaarrrgh!

Captain
Uggh... They got me.

Soldier 2
The Special Pose...
The soldiers move aside to let Cloud and the others into the control room.
Cloud crouches down, wringing his hands. Yuffie doesn't look any better off.

Cloud
Someone... please. I'm sorry I can't take it anymore.
The lack of space, the shaking, the roar of the engine...

Barret
Stop your blubberin'!! How we gonna move this without you?

Yuffie
I... I can't... I'm history.

Cait Sith
I can't fit in this seat... No good!

Vincent
Better hurry. Reno's getting away.
Tifa, Nanaki, or Cid goes up to the control panel and presses a button.

Tifa
See!?
Just fiddle with the controls, and we'll get somewhere!
Hey Cloud? Why don't you try piloting it?
They say you don't get motion sickness if you're driving.

Nanaki
It moved!
Cloud!! Try it!

Cid
Hunka junk... just gotta do this!
SEE! Now you take over!
Cloud gets up.

Cloud
Hey, you're right... I DO feel a little better driving.
No sweat. Just leave everything to me.

Barret
Don't worry!
If it breaks down, I'll smack it one--that'll fix it!

Tifa
You can do it, Cloud!

Yuffie
I'll hold my breath, so HURRY!

Cait Sith
Oh please drive safely, Cloud!

Vincent
Shinra's technology is really something.

Cid
I'll be watchin' from here!

Soldiers
I thank you! I am happy to be a hostage!
Piloting a submarine is very difficult! I am completely clueless!

Commander
Hey! Who am I to know!

Cloud
Well, now what?
- Read the manual
- Sit in the seat
- Leave it alone
[Controls reference]

Mission Orders: Presently on the ocean floor near Junon, a Red Leader Submarine carrying Huge Materia is being escorted by covert Shinra Submarine Units.
Furthermore, it has been confirmed that several mines have been dispersed onto the ocean floor.
The ocean floor can only be monitored with Shinra's Sonar Radar Screen.
Enemy subs can only be detected with the Sonar area. Get in front of the detected enemy sub and "Lock On"!!
Push [] button to fire the torpedo!
The mines are found on the radar screen at the top of the indicators. The mines inflict great damage, so be careful!
Objective: Sink the Red Leader Submarine carrying the Huge Materia! Time Limit: 10 minutes!
Cloud sits down.

Cloud
Everything seems set...
- Start the mission!
This switch...?
Main screen: ON
Change the screen mode.
Leave it alone
Cloud shrugs.
Cloud and the others get on with the mission and shoot down the red leader sub.

Cloud
Phew--! We did it!!
The Huge Materia should be at the bottom of the sea by now. Let's continue the search...

...All Shinra Submarine Units, do you read...?
...All Shinra Submarine Units, do you read...?

Cloud
Hmm...? ...Must be from Shinra.
...Report, No. 2...

Barret
Is it us?

Yuffie
Oh my gawd...! They mean us.

Cait Sith
We need to respond!

Vincent
We've no choice but to respond.

Cloud
All right, I'll do it.
This is Shinra No. 2... Everything's normal.

...Roger...
...Your next mission is...
...Return to Junon Dock...
...We will transport the Huge Materia from the airport...
...Those without other assignments will report for guard duty...
That is all. Over and out...

Cloud
Junon Airport... We should make it if we hurry.
Forget about the Huge Materia for now.
We're climbing!

Tifa
Aye, aye... CAPTAIN!

Nanaki
Take o-ff!

Cid
The airport? No sweat!
They return to the surface and dock the submarine outside Junon. They hurry back to Junon.

Fisherman
It seems like there's something going on again up there.
Is that huge plane going to take off again with that deafening roar?

Older Man
I just saw some Shinra soldiers all huddled together discussing something.
They said a plane carrying Huge Materia would be taking off from the airport above.
They take the elevator to Upper Junon.

Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Finished loading the Huge Materia!
All we have to do now is to ready the cargo ship, 'Gelnika', for departure and we're done!
Cloud arrives at the airport only to watch Gelnika take off from Junon.

Cloud
Oh no! The Huge Materia...

Barret
Let's go after it!

Yuffie
Let's get there before they do and catch 'em!

Cait Sith
How 'bout us getting there beforehand and stealing it back?

Vincent
Let's go after it.

Tifa
Where are they headed?

Nanaki
Where's their destination?

Cid
Where's that thing headed?

Cloud
Rocket Town, of course.

Soldier
Whew... I hope everything goes all right until we get to Rocket Town. Then, our mission is nearly complete.

Soldier 2
Not so fast. We still have one major task... we still have to transport the stuff...

Soldier
The stuff...

Soldier on the Path to the Airport
I'm glad we got Gelnika to the Rocket Town safely.
But they sure think big. Looks like they're going to use the Huge Materia's to break up Meteor...
Cloud and the others leave Junon.
Searching the ocean floor, they find the red submarine.

Cloud
So this is the Leader Sub...
Damn...... makes me sick just thinking about it...

...Huge Materia recovered...
...no damage appears to have been sustained...

Cloud
...Phew... That's good to hear.
Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!
They also come across the sunken ship Gelnika.

Cloud
This is the Shinra's Gelnika type airplane... I wonder why it went down here?
They enter a side room.

Cloud
What is this place...? Must be some kind of a Research Establishment because there's a Mako generator?
In the hallway, they encounter the Turks.

Cloud
Turks!?

Rude
...again?

Reno
We just seem to keep running into each other lately!
There were weapons and Materia developed solely to destroy Sephiroth.

Rude
...but, it was attacked by Weapon and sunk to the bottom of the sea.

Reno
I can't give you what's here. We'll take out Sephiroth.
I guess this is our last meeting.

Rude
I won't let you get in our way.
Cloud and the others fight the Turks.

Reno
These guys are pretty tough.
He runs off.
He runs off after Reno.

Cloud
So Shinra's new, secret weapon was on this Airship...
Into the room beyond...

Cloud
This must be the Cargo Room...
This is terrible... It's all messed up...
Cloud and the others salvage what they can from the Cargo Room and leave for Rocket Town.
